# StorageType

**Enumeration**

Types of storage area that the framework identifies in a captured room.

## Declaration

```swift
enum StorageType
```

## Overview

When the framework observes a storage area in the physical environment, it chooses a type among these options that best matches the type of storage. The framework adds that instance of this enum to the [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/Object/attributes] array for the object (see [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/objects]) in the captured room that represents the storage in the captured room.

## Choosing a storage area type

- **StorageType.cabinet**: An enclosed storage area.
- **StorageType.shelf**: An open, wall-located storage area.

## Conforms To

- CapturedRoomAttribute
- CaseIterable
- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
title: StorageType
